alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Georgetown County through 1000 PM EDT... At 924 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a small cluster of strong thunderstorms between Oatland and Jackson, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Pawleys Island, Oatland, Litchfield Beach and Georgetown Memorial Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
